text: The 1904 Geneva Covenanters football team represented the Geneva College during the 1904 college football season. Head coach Smith Alford led the team for the first year. The team finished the season with a final record of 1–4–2. ==Schedule== ==References== Geneva Category:Geneva Golden Tornadoes football seasons Geneva Covenanters football
title: 1904 Geneva Covenanters football team
